visualizationConfigs.vQuery: MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN n.resultField as SPKendTime , n.AvgDuplicateBlocksCoverage as AvgDuplicateBlocksCoverage ORDER BY n.executionId DESC limit 2

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN n.resultField as SPKendTime , n.AvgDuplicateBlocksCoverage as AvgDuplicateBlocksCoverage LIMIT 5

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN n.resultField as SPKendTime , n.NumberOfQualityBlocks as NumberOfQualityBlocks  ORDER BY n.executionId DESC limit 2

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN n.resultField as SPKendTime , n.NumberOfQualityBlocks as NumberOfQualityBlocks LIMIT 5
